definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Yesterday afternoon, reporters asked the hospital to call the matter to the altar.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午，记者致电地坛医院询问此事。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you tell me how far it is from Xidan to Ditan park?
sentences.chinese: 请问，你能告诉我从西单到地坛公园有多远吗？
地坛医院的代理人反复强调。

sentences.english: Besides the altar, the attraction of the park also lies in its quietness.
sentences.chinese: 除了地坛，公园的魅力还在于它的静。

sentences.english: Sounds interesting! What interesting places are there in The Ditan temple fair?
sentences.chinese: 听起来很有意思，地坛庙会有什么好玩的？

sentences.english: But, talking about Ditan Park, there are not so many people who know it.
sentences.chinese: 但是，说起地坛公园，就没有那么多的人去过了。

sentences.english: After the event, Ditan hospitals require hospitalization Ming month.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生后，地坛医院要求张明住院治疗一个月。

definition: Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
Fayuan or Source of the Law temple in Beijing
Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
